meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6306.

td.p: Marie McGraw, a senior at MIT from Cleveland, Ohio
Greer Mackebee, a senior at Duke University from Knoxville, Tennessee
Sarah Bauer, a junior at Indiana University from Carmel, Indiana

tr.td: CALL THE POLICE
STRINGING ALONG
STATES BY ATTRACTIONS
RECENT MOVIES
BATTLE OF THE CENTURY
"CO____ED"
